---

**Goal**
A clear description of what you want to accomplish.
Preferably the important bit is placed at the beginning

**Proposed approach**

A clear and concise description of how you want this to be accomplished.
You should mention any existing sub-issues.

**Additional context**

You may add any other context or screenshots about the feature request here.
